post:
================ **XiNiX : Company Information**  ==============

XiNiX™ InfoTech Pvt. Ltd. is a Registered Company ( No. 45546 ) which specializes in Web Hosting, Server Solution, Managed Services VPS and E-mail Services. Starting its Web presence as "Inet Web Services", in 2008 the company was re-organized and the name XiNiX™ came to existence. 

The Company has spread its operations across the Globe with its Headquarters based in Bangalore. Most importantly, our business is focused on keeping our technical support and customer service strong. We provide quality services at an affordable prices.

**Some of our Reviews :**

- Searchen : [Here](http://www.serchen.com/company/xinix/)
- WebHostingStuff : [Here](http://www.serchen.com/company/xinix/)  
- WHTop : [Here](http://www.whtop.com/review/xinix.net)

**Company Highlights :**

- 12+ Years in Business. We are a Reliable Entity with Proven Track Record
- Full Value of Money with our Exclusive Offers & Unmatched Pricing
- 24x7 Support. Initial Reply : 30 Minutes ( Usually Under 15 Minutes )
- Unmetered 100 Mbps and 1 Gbps Network Available
- Latest cPanel + CloudLinux OS over Xeon E5 Nodes
- NO Setup FEE of ANY Kind , NO Hidden Fees
- Fixed Prices on a Month-to-Month Basis
- Our Websites : - US : https://www.xinix.us - EU : https://www.xinix.in

**SSD Shared ( cPanel ) Web Hosting Features :**

- **Powerful Servers :**  32 GB DDR3 RAM Servers with Xeon E3 CPU
- **RAID :** RAID 10 Data Protection with ultra fast 6 GB/s Disks
- **Control Panel :** cPanel Control Panel
- Installer : Softaculous Pro Auto Installer
- CDN : CloudFlare Global Content Delivery Network
- SEO : Attracta Built-in SEO tools
- Site Builder : RV Site Builder Pro w/1000+ Web site Templates
- Backup : R1Soft Daily Backups Under cPanel & Offsite backups 
- File Manager : Web-enabled File Manager
- Mail : POP/IMAP/SMTP and Online Webmail
- Virus Protection : Automatic email virus protection
- Anti Spam : User-level and system-wide spam protection
- Video Addon : FFMPEG Enabled web hosting
- **Kernel Security :** CloudLinux Kernel - faster performance and security!
- Software Includes : Software packages included ( CURL, GD, ImageMagick, PHP 5 / 6 with suPHP, - MySQL 5, CGI/Perl 5 )
- Extensions : Ruby on Rails, FrontPage Extensions, Python, Pear, IonCube, Zend Optimizer, and many more!)

Plan Name : **LY - 1G** 
 
**Server Locations** : Dallas , USA & London, UK

- Web Space : 1 GB SSD Space
- Bandwidth : Unmetered Bandwidth
- Sub Domains / Databases / Emails : Unlimited
- **cPanel 11 Control Panel** + Cloud Linux OS
- **SSH Access Included**
- 99.95% Uptime Guranteed ( SLA ) , **100% Uptime Since Past 2 years**
- Instant Activation after Payment ( NO WAITING AT ALL !! )
